price: (3) When we have died and have become dust, [we will return to life]? That is a distant [i.e., unlikely] return."
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban dhālika rajʿun baʿīdun
